|          CHAPTER 1          |
-------------------------------


###You are walking home after a long day.
#There's no doubt, this hasn't been a nice day.
#You missed every possible bus and/or train.
#And it started raining,# too. #Of course, you do not have an umbrella with you.

#Looking up at the sky, it looks like all the clouds in the world just decided to gather right above your head,#
swallowing all of light and propagating dark vibes to the atmosphere and to the ground.
